content.title: Month of Prayer
content.description: Join us on a prayer journey throughout the lent season.

image1.alt: Three friends hanging out and walking together in the city.

content.text1: Join us on a prayer journey through the Lent season, right into Good Friday and Easter. We put together a number of resources to help you engage in prayer and reach for hope.

button1.description: Click to sign up for month of prayer resources.

content.text1: The Road to Hope is a 6-week prayerful experience that runs from March 2-April 16. We've created a couple of resources like a prayer booklet and prayer cards to guide us through the season. You can sign up for a physical or digital kit option below.

image1.alt: Group of friends from church sitting together, and talking.

content.text1: From April 13-14, we'll be uniting as a church family to collectively pray for 24 hours. Pick a time slot to join in and receive a digital prayer guide.

image1.alt: A man smiling while standing by a waterfall.
